version_description:
MIGHTY SUPERBOT UPDATE

Mega Events to Unleash the SUPERBOT
Fight in LIMITED TIME EVENTS and earn grand rewards to unlock Scorpion, the mighty SuperBot.

Make SUPERBOT POWER Yours
Get the stronger, faster & deadlier SCORPION – The Sting Tail to devastate opponents in PvP.

Pack more punches!
Go on a rampage with new Robots. Get JUGGERNAUT – The unstoppable force and send a chill up opponents spine with FRAUST – The Arctic Storm

THE BIG SPRING UPDATE

Make SUPERBOT POWER Yours
Get the mighty AZTEC– The Sun Warrior to devastate opponents in PvP.

Pack deadlier punches!
Go on a rampage with NEW ROBOTS. Get the Demon Predator DARK FIEND and dominate with DRAGO, The Cold-blooded Killer

WIN CRUSHER, PSYTRON & CARDINAL CHAOS in an enhanced LIVE EVENTS with fight experience improved.

Exclusive CUSTOMIZED DEALS for you to make the right purchase.

Bug Fixes and Optimizations Done

Introducing CHALLENGES MODE

•3 Exciting New Challenge zones to win Premium Robot Rewards
•Classic – Establish yourself as a Contender
•VIP – Prove that you are a Champion
•Legend – Become the Master of Champions

New Superbot!

•Unleash Superbot Power with ANUBIS – The Golden Jackal
•Fight in Limited Time LIVE EVENTS to unlock your Superbot ANUBIS

New Robots!
•Hit more Harder with RONIN – The Noble Warrior &
•THJORN – the Ravager

PVP Enhancements!
•Top Score in New & Improved PVP Leaderboard to win exciting milestone rewards

3 NEW VIP CHALLENGES to win Premium Rewards

•THE BIG MATCH – create winning plays with Tackle
•STATE OF WAR – unleash the WW2 machine Sarge
•DEMOLITION DUEL – hammer down opponents with Metro

Bug fixes & optimizations done

SUMMER GAMES 2016 SPECIAL UPDATE!

Win glory for your Nation by becoming the world Champion.

1.All New Superbot!

Dominate with the Powerful SUPERBOT, ‘OLYMPUS’ - the Robot Sumo Medalist

2.New Live Event & Robots!

Be the World Champion in SUMMER GAMES SPECIAL LIVE EVENT with:

•Mighty DRAGO GOLD and
•Deadly RONIN GOLD

3.Experience Victory in an All New Summer Games Arena!

Reign Supreme in the sumo wrestling DOHYO ARENA.

THE VIP EXPERIENCE UPDATE

•New VIP Program - Unlock VIP levels & bigger benefits with in-app purchases.
•Earn Special Privileges including extra energy, faster timers, health regen, discounts & greater fight rewards with higher VIP levels
•Exclusive VIP Pennants and Bonus cards to take your fight experience up!
•Claim upgrade cards and bonus event tickets to unlock new VIP Live Events
•Unlock exclusive robots & subscribe for additional fortnightly rewards

The RED BERET is here!
Claim the new Superbot “RED BERET-The Commando” in the ‘Art of War’ Live Event.

HALLOWEEN MEGA UPDATE!!!

INTRODUCING STAR ROBOTS
· Transform your Atom, Zeus, Midas, Noisy Boy & other Champions to 1*, 2* and 3*
· Fight as Atom 3* & take on Zeus to see who becomes versus champion!

PLAYER VS PLAYER LEAGUES
· New PVP Versus leagues - Take your 1*, 2* and 3* Robot Champs to reign supreme in Star Leagues
· Craft & Transform robots with PVP league transform cards
· Claim Milestone prizes - the more fights you win, the better rewards you’ll get
· Top the Ranked Leaderboard in Leagues to Claim exclusive Star Robots!

NEW LIVE EVENT & SUPERBOT
· Get tickets and enter the exciting Fright Night Live Event
· Fight to win DIABLO – The Dark Prince, the Halloween special superbot

STAR ENHANCEMENTS
• Experience an improved and optimized Star league.
• Own exciting Star Robots with visual enhancements done.

INTRODUCING STAR ROBOTS
• Transform your Atom, Zeus, Midas, Noisy Boy & other Champions to 1*, 2* and 3*
• Fight as Atom 3* & take on Zeus to see who becomes versus champion!

PLAYER VS PLAYER LEAGUES
• New PVP Versus leagues - Take your 1*, 2* and 3* Robot Champs to reign supreme in Star Leagues
• Craft & Transform robots with PVP league transform cards
• Claim Milestone prizes - the more fights you win, the better rewards you’ll get
• Top the Ranked Leaderboard in Leagues to Claim exclusive Star Robots!

NEW LIVE EVENT & SUPERBOT
• Get tickets and enter the exciting Fright Night Live Event
• Fight to win superbot DIABLO – The Dark Prince

NEW 4 STAR ROBOTS
· Unleash Ultimate Power of 4* Atom, Zeus, Asura, Scorpion and other champions in Versus Leagues

VERSUS LEAGUES IMPROVEMENTS
· More Rewards: Celebrate with three exciting rewards each Milestone
· Newer Opponents: Prove your mettle against star robots in Versus
· Matchmaking enhanced to get better Versus opponents
· Optimizations done for a more exciting player experience

EXCITING CHRISTMAS UPDATE

3RD ANNIVERSARY SPECIAL
Win awesome rewards during this mega celebration
· NEW SUPERBOT – ‘GROUCH’. Win the Christmas superbot Grouch – The Grump, in Live Events
· 4 STAR LEAGUES - Be the first to win a 4 star champion in Versus Leagues
· EARN MIGHTIER REWARDS in Versus with new Smart Reward System
· Unveil super-fun Real Steel Stickers for you to animate iMessage chat with friends

MERRY CHRISTMAS THEME
· Amazing Christmas robot and arena decorations for celebrations
· Enjoy special surprise offers and delights this festive season

FESTIVE NEW YEAR UPDATE!!!

PVP ENHANCEMENTS & EPIC REWARDS
· 2017 Special 4 Star Leagues: Legendary rewards like never-before. Compete to win 4 Star Zeus, 3 Star Red Beret & 2 Star Asura in Rank Rewards.
· Optimizations done for a more exciting player experience

2017 LEGENDARY CHALLENGES – Are you the No.1 Fighter?
· Battle for supremacy in brand new Challenges - Atlanta Showdown, Assassin’s Brawl & Annihilation: Code Red.

EXCITING OFFERS
· Enjoy special surprise offers and delights this festive season

BIGGEST WRB UPDATE EVER

UNLEASH ABILITIES POWER
· Unleash Oil Leak, Stun, Perfect Block, Corrosion and many more robot Abilities in battle
· Overpower opponents with twin combat Abilities added for each Robot.
· Unlock robot’s 2nd Ability by reaching star level 2
· Upgrade Abilities to Dominate – with Robot Ability Cards earned from Spins
· Win Ability Spins in Versus mode

THE ABILITIES ADVANTAGE
· Strategize to Victory - Certain robot’s abilities have an advantage over another. For example - Blacktop’s Special Steal counters Ambush’s Special Rush

MASSIVE GAMEPLAY ENHANCEMENTS
· Dodge or evade opponents Attacks: DOUBLE TAP on UP and DOWN arrow buttons and watch robots side-step to avoid being hit.
· Improved control response for fast-paced movement & action

MIGHTY NEW SUPERBOT
· Battle in Live Events to win DJ ELECTRIX , The BeatDown Dancer

NEW HD GRAPHICS
· New Arenas with 3D effects
· Existing Arenas and Robots with HD quality art

EXPERIENCE THE NEW WRB ERA
• Gameplay improved for more extreme fighting action
• Bug Fixes & Optimization done to make game experience better than ever
• Fights like never before await the Robot Boxing Champion in you
• Exciting Updates Coming Soon

MYSTERIOUS POWER UPDATE

NEW SUPERBOT
Win ‘Phantom’, The Ghost, in Live Events. Abilities:
· Rupture Strike – Chance to trigger Oil Leak for a few seconds. Hit Damage increases during Oil Leak
· Perfect Strike – When opponent’s health drops below a level, gain 100% chance to deliver critical damage

EXCITING GAMEPLAY ENHANCEMENTS
Get to know when robot ability is triggered with amazing text animations.

MAJOR GAME SIZE OPTIMIZATION
Now Real Steel WRB will occupy less space on your device

NEXT LEVEL UPDATE

VERSUS ENHANCEMENTS
· Matchmaking Improved - Now opponents will not be over powerful but challenging
· Player experience made easier – Get Milestone Rewards directly
· Now get access to Revenge feature from Main Menu

GAMEPLAY IMPROVEMENTS
· Visually enhanced gameplay experience
· Dodge action in fights made more responsive to quickly evade attacks
· Unleash the power of Special Moves with new touch input mechanics
· Improved Abilities for enhanced fight experience
· Feel the robot boxing action with Haptic Feedback implementation

GAME BALANCING AND OTHER OPTIMIZATIONS
• Visually enhanced gameplay experience
• Dodge action in fights made more responsive to quickly evade attacks
• Unleash the power of Special Moves with new touch input mechanics
• Improved Abilities for enhanced fight experience
• Feel the robot boxing action with Haptic Feedback implementation

VERSUS ENHANCEMENTS
• Matchmaking Improved - Now opponents will not be over powerful but challenging
• Player experience made easier – Get Milestone Rewards directly
• Now get access to Revenge feature from Main Menu

· Unleash Superbot BRUTUS – The Congo King in Live Events
· Never miss on bots in perpetually active Live Events store
· Spot-on navigation to help you redeem your achievements
· Stay on track with your challenge objectives on Pause Menu

Flare up the fireworks because it’s GRAND Celebration Time.
“Real Steel WRB turns 4”
Grab the magnificent Anniversary Bonanza that will delight ardent fans and newcomers! Begin your steel smashing rumble in jubilation, and redeem SPLENDID rewards – THIS WEEK ONLY
Receive 2 Free Robots and start your WRB journey like a star
Play sensational Live Events to unlock The Congo King “BRUTUS”
Level-up your metal beasts with Free Transform Cards
Own your opponents with Unlimited Energy

WRB Halloween Howl
Win incredible Halloween Zeus at 25% discount in Fright Night Live Event
Redeem 2X score multiplier by playing PvP with Halloween Zeus
Build a lethal team with HollowJack, Dreadlord and Fiend, available in Special Halloween Robot Pack at 35% discount

FROSTY HOLIDAYS’ UPDATE
• Now Enjoy Seamless Action on Your iPhone X
• Warm Up & Win Over the Dreadful Champions with ‘Klaus’ – The Christmas Knight
• Introduced multiple Robot Packs at Throwaway Prices
On our pursuit to deliver the best steel-crushing action-packed experience on mobile, we’ve released this update with bug fixes and performance enhancements.
On our pursuit to deliver the best steel-crushing action-packed experience on mobile, we’ve released this update with bug fixes and performance enhancements.
On our pursuit to deliver the best steel-crushing action-packed experience on mobile, we’ve released this update with bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Now get flawless experience on your iPhone X screens

Bug Fixes and optimizations

Now get flawless experience on your iPhone X screens
Bug Fixes and optimizations

Enter the Holiday season with amazing deals and exciting events. Have fun with the new World Robot Boxing update.
NEW ROBOT ADDED
Welcome the steel warrior ZeroG from USA. This 1430 LBS Flying Machine comes equipped with powerful jetpack and flaming rockets. Add ZeroG to your roster and turn your opponents into ashes.
AWESOME DEALS AND OFFER PACKS
Join in the action as Robots around the world gather to fight! Take your Robots into the ring and destroy your opponents to level-up. Discover awesome new Christmas Deals and Offers as you advance in the game.
EPIC EVENTS FOR EPIC REWARDS
Participate in the exciting Holiday Events to win amazing Rewards.
UPGRADE ROBOTS
Compete in challenging bouts across all events to collect rewards. Get powerful Robots and upgrade them to build your ultimate war-machine.
ULTIMATE GAMEPLAY
We’ve made certain adjustments in the game for smoother and effortless gameplay. It’s time you jump right into the action.

REDUCED LOADING TIME
Game Loads Faster.  We’ve reduced the Loading Time significantly. Certain tool adjustments and in-game optimizations will now reduce your wait-time to jump right into the action.
SUBSCRIPTION PACKS
Your daily dose of Gold from the Subscription Packs is now available in the Gold Tab.
NEW DAILY DEALS
Awesome New Deals have been added to the store!
EPIC EVENTS FOR EPIC REWARDS
Participate in the “Will of Iron” and “Total Domination” Events and win amazing Rewards.
UPGRADE ROBOTS
Updated and Reintroduced “Spectre”. Do you have it on your roster? Head to the ring and win enough coins to upgrade Spectre and unleash its wrath on your opponents.
UPGRADE BOOSTS
Use Boosts in the game to give you the final edge to win over your opponents.
ADDRESSED SCORE SUBMISSIONS
We heard you and addressed the issue where scores post certain PvP fights were not being submitted for a few players.

New Exciting Challenges
Brawl Real-Time With Friends

NEW ROBOT ADDED
This Halloween marks the wickedly exciting addition of “Terror” to the world of Robot Boxing. Welcome the black titan from USA, holding the Giant’s sword. Get him on your roster and let your opponents tremble in terror.
AWESOME DEALS AND OFFER PACKS
Join in the action as Robots around the world gather to fight for their own version of Trick-or-Treat! Take your Robots into the ring and destroy your opponents to level-up. Discover New Deals and Offers as you advance in the game.
EPIC EVENTS FOR EPIC REWARDS
Participate in the exciting Events to win amazing Rewards.
UPGRADE ROBOTS
Compete in challenging bouts across all events to collect Upgrade Tokens as milestone rewards. Get powerful Robots and upgrade them to build your ultimate war-machine.
ULTIMATE GAMEPLAY
We’ve made certain adjustments in the game for smoother and effortless gameplay. It’s time you jump right into the action.

This Thanksgiving serves as an opportunity for us to thank you players, for all the love and support you've continued to shower on us throughout this entire journey. We will continue to raise your excitement levels and keep the World Robot Boxing contest, your most entertaining experience.
NEW ROBOT ADDED
Welcome the scrapyard czar from Russia. While every move of this 1430 LBS armored giant is lethal, be specially warned of the unexpected fast maneuvers and its blighting fire-monging special move - Burn in Hell. Add Wildfire to your roster and turn your opponents into ashes.
AWESOME DEALS AND OFFER PACKS

Compete in challenging bouts across all events to collect Upgrade Tokens as milestone rewards. Get powerful Robots and upgrade them to build your ultimate war-machine.

We’ve made certain adjustments in the game for smoother and effortless gameplay. It’s time you jump right into the action.

Enter 2020 with amazing deals and exciting events. Have fun with the new World Robot Boxing update.
NEW ROBOT
Got your hands yet on the steel warrior ZeroG from the USA? This 1300 LBS Flying Machine comes equipped with powerful jetpack and flaming rockets. Add ZeroG to your roster and turn your opponents into ashes.
AWESOME DEALS AND OFFER PACKS

UPGRADE ROBOTS
Compete in challenging bouts across all events to collect rewards. Get powerful Robots and upgrade them to build your ultimate war-machine.
ULTIMATE GAMEPLAY
We’ve made certain adjustments in the game for smoother and effortless gameplay. It’s time you jump right into the action.

Have fun with exciting events and amazing deals. Enjoy the new World Robot Boxing update.
GRAPHICS SETTINGS
The graphics settings of the game were adjusted in tandem with the new GPUs that have been introduced recently for the best visual quality and enhanced playing experience.
GAMEPLAY ADJUSTMENTS
We’ve made certain adjustments in the PvP mode for smoother and effortless gameplay.
NEW ROBOT PACKS
Find New Robot Packs and upgrade your roster to dominate your Opponents across arenas. Seal your claim to the World Robot Boxing Championship with the best robots by your side.

Enjoy enhanced navigation and gameplay experience with a few changes made to the game interface. It’s time you jump right into the action.

Hi Champion! Enjoy improvements across the game interface for enhanced navigation.

While the mech warriors knocked out a few bugs, certain adjustments and optimizations were done in the game for smoother, effortless and flawless gameplay experience. Build your ultimate war-machine and participate in the exciting new Events. Have fun with exciting events and amazing deals.

Enjoy the new World Robot Boxing update.

Happy Halloween Champion!

Enjoy improvements across the game interface for enhanced navigation.

While the mech warriors knocked out a few bugs, certain adjustments and optimizations were done in the game for smoother, effortless and flawless gameplay experience. Build your ultimate war-machine and participate in the exciting new Events. Have fun with exciting events and amazing deals.

Enjoy the new World Robot Boxing update.

As the world readies to spend time with family and gorge on turkey, World Robot Boxing Thanksgiving is a full-on action entertainment reminder of the season.
While gags play off of Thanksgiving traditions, mech warriors are busy knocking out bugs. Optimizations were done in the game for a smoother, effortless, and flawless gameplay experience. So, build your ultimate war-machine to participate in exciting new Events and have fun with amazing deals.
Happy Thanksgiving Champion!

HOLIDAY UPDATE

With the Holiday season just around the corner, get ready for plenty of fantastic fun coming this Fall bringing in the opportunity to claim the awesome new robot Valor!

Get ready for amazing new events Triplicity, Quartet and VII that extend to 3, 4 and 7 days respectively. Bug Fixes and Optimizations were done in the game for a smoother, effortless, and flawless gameplay experience. So, don your most garish jumper, and dive into the fun...

NEW YEAR UPDATE
While we've been hitting new heights every year, why shall 2021 be any different? Get ready to start this year with events that will challenge your fighting skills, and Offers that bring you opportunities to get the greatest robots on your roster.

Take the recently added robot Valor to the new events that are quicker and yet pose extreme excitement. Bug Fixes and Optimizations were done in the game for a smoother, effortless, and flawless gameplay experience.

We've introduced multiple paths to an event quest. This way, you may complete an event path to winning rewards. Champs will need to explore the entire Event Quest to win big event completion benefits. We've also placed many rewards on paths on specific nodes, so those who target and strive for particular items can strategize accordingly.

Hope you've got the recently added robot 'Valor' on your roster. Bug Fixes and Optimizations were done in the game for a smoother, effortless, and flawless gameplay experience.

After introducing multiple paths to event quest, you may choose to complete an event path for awesome rewards or explore the entire Event Quest to get completion benefits. Rewards have been also been placed on specific nodes along the path, so those who target and strive for particular items can strategize accordingly.

Bug Fixes and Optimizations were done in the game for a smoother, effortless, and flawless gameplay experience.

After introducing multiple paths to event quest, you may choose to complete an event path for awesome rewards or explore the entire Event Quest to get completion benefits. Rewards have been also been placed on specific nodes along the path, so those who target and strive for particular items can strategize accordingly.

Bug Fixes and Optimizations were done in the game for a smoother, effortless, and flawless gameplay experience.
Bug Fixes and Optimizations were done in the game for a smoother, effortless, and flawless gameplay experience.

Get ready to participate in events that will challenge your fighting skills. While you make the most out of multiple paths to event quest and collect specific items from node rewards, bug fixes and optimizations were done in the game for a smoother, effortless, and flawless gameplay experience.
The fun and frolics with mighty Robot Warriors are never-ending. Add new robots to your roster from various offer packs and take them to entertaining bouts to come back as champions!
